snippet.title: Tiny Bookshop - Official Trailer | Wholesome Direct 2023
snippet.description:
Watch the trailer for Tiny Bookshop to meet some of the characters, see customization, and more from this upcoming narrative management game, where you leave everything behind and open a tiny bookshop by the sea. Stock your tiny bookshop with different books and items, set up shop in scenic locations, and run your cozy second-hand bookshop while getting to know the locals. Tiny Bookshop will be available on PC.

#GameTrailers #SoG #Gaming
